item.title: Welsh Woman Pleads Guilty To Sending Fart Videos To Boyfriend's Ex
item.description: Rhiannon Evans admitted sending at least eight videos to Deborah Prytherch where she passed gas directly into the lens.

item.title: Johnstown Flood Museum Closed Because Of Flooding
item.description: A Pennsylvania museum dedicated to remembering the effects of a 19th century flood is temporarily closed because of an interior water leak.
